item.title: Mindfulness for Parents with MRS JOY
item.description:
Mindfulness For Parents is designed to support you to discover:
-What is Mindfulness and how it can help you and your family -The 3 Pillars of Mindfulness -How to bring Mindfulness into your daily activities -How to practice Mindfulness with your child â€“ or kids, if you have more than one - How to develop more concentration - How to increase kindness, self-compassion and wellbeing to your life and in the lives of the ones you love and care.
